outputs.output_descr: The Project Initiation Plan (PIP) Project on Preparatory Assistance in support of National DDR Programme (NDDRP) in South Sudan is based on the request of the National DDR Commission (NDDRC) for UNDP support for completion of planning and preparation for implementation of the National DDR Programme (NDDRP) under leadership of Government of South Sudan in 2013 – 2020. This Project Initiation Plan (PIP) aims to support the NDDRC as well as strengthen UNDP’s engagement on DDR in South Sudan through the provision of technical advice and support on DDR policies and strategies, as well as on program
